Title: Winner
Description: ['In an athletic meet, an awkward boy tries his best to excel in a field he is not good at. He realizes that what is important is not winning or losing. It is  refusing to be discouraged or running away from a challenge no matter how many times he fails. ']
Related: ['Prequel: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Yiguo Da Yingjiu', 'Sequel: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Juezhan Ci Shidai']
